H0.text: For which film did Tatum O'Neal receive the Best Supporting Actress 'Oscar'. The Bad News Bears

H3.text: For which film did Tatum O'Neal receive the Best Supporting Actress 'Oscar'. A Paper Moon

A4.text: On April 2, 1974, at age ten, Tatum O'Neal won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress and the Golden Globe Award for New Star of the Year â€“ Actress for her performance in Paper Moon, released in May 1973.

A5.text: At the age of 10, she became the youngest person ever to win a competitive Academy Award, for her performance as Addie Loggins in Paper Moon co-starring her father, Ryan O'Neal.
